txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Farm hardy bulbs for the folk of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled farmer such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by cultivating hardy bulbs for them.

'I hear that you have some skill in tilling the lands. The people here are not accustomed to such cold winters. Do you have any knowledge of plants that might be more hardy that can be given to the farmers of Wildermore?\n\n'We must begin growing where we can, but it will be different now.'
The recipe for hardy bulbs (both field and crop) has been given to you by Hildelith.\n\nYou should farm hardy bulbs for the folk of Wildermore.
'Ah! I have never seen this variety before. Will it truly thrive in this wintry climate? I hope so....'
Deliver the hardy bulbs to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have crafted Hardy Bulbs and should now deliver them to Hildelith.
